notes: NOT a game - utility/divination tool, no mobile game controls needed
Use tap-to-reveal pattern for card flipping
Cards start face-down, tap to flip and reveal
Shuffle button generates new three-card spread
Visual card back design in noir terminal aesthetic
Smooth flip animations with CSS transforms
Position labels: Past, Present, Future above cards
Tarot deck: 22 Major Arcana cards sufficient
Store card state to prevent re-shuffle on accidental tap
Single column layout on mobile, three columns on desktop
Cards display as grid: 1 column mobile, 3 columns desktop
Use touchstart + click for card flip interactions
Cyan (#00ffff) for card backs, sky blue (#7ec8e3) for revealed cards
Red (#ff0000) shuffle button, prominent and accessible

userPrompt: <@&1437054123307700348> produce a tarot reading based on three random cards of your choosing and make it an interactive webpage

warnings.message: Card hover effects present - ensure tap interactions work equally well on mobile
Cards may be small on mobile (90-100px min-width at 480px) - consider larger minimum for better tap accuracy

docs.releaseNotes: built Tarot Reading - check it out
